awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 2 nominations.

fullplot: Study of interracial marriage in the 1960's. A white divorcèe falls in love with and marries an African-American man. When her ex-husband sues for custody of her child, arguing that a mixed household is an improper place to raise the girl, the new husband fights for his parental rights in court, fighting against a judge who represents the prejudices of the era.

title: One Potato, Two Potato
